title: Dev tooling - update command - tooling help and Quarkus guides do not reflect that the changes get applied by default

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

body:
### Describe the bug

Tooling help and Quarkus guides are talking about logging of Quarkus-related recommended updates, but in reality the changes get applied to the application.

https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/32013 PR didn't touch docs and description of the commands/tasks.

The issue affects:
 - Quarkus CLI
 - Maven plugin
 - Gradle plugin

Commands/tasks description are different for each tool, the description should be unified unified.

Help and guides are talking about logging of Quarkus-related recommended updates.
 - Gradle guide is not talking about `update` task at all.
 - CLI and Maven plugin guides will need to be updated to reflect current behaviour (available commands, command output example, etc.)

Commands/tasks descriptions:
 - https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/main/devtools/cli/src/main/java/io/quarkus/cli/Update.java#L12
 - https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/main/devtools/maven/src/main/java/io/quarkus/maven/UpdateMojo.java#L25
 - https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/main/devtools/gradle/gradle-application-plugin/src/main/java/io/quarkus/gradle/tasks/QuarkusUpdate.java#L113

Documentation:
 - https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/main/docs/src/main/asciidoc/cli-tooling.adoc?plain=1#L252
 - https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/main/docs/src/main/asciidoc/maven-tooling.adoc?plain=1#L1059
 - https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/main/docs/src/main/asciidoc/gradle-tooling.adoc?plain=1

### Expected behavior

Tooling help and Quarkus guides reflect the recent changes to the `update` command where the changes get directly applied.

SIDE NOTE: This change of behaviour could be also mentioned in https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/wiki/Migration-Guide-3.0

### Actual behavior

Tooling help and Quarkus guides are talking about logging of Quarkus-related recommended updates, but in reality the changes get applied to the application.

https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/32013 PR didn't touch docs and description of the commands/tasks.

### How to Reproduce?

 - Use the CLI/Maven/Gradle tools and print help for `update`
 - Check Quarkus documentation for CLI/Maven/Gradle tools

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

macOS

### Output of `java -version`

Java 17

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

Quarkus main

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)
